labels.name: story
labels.value: Verify that the tooltip message is displayed when user clicks on Register button after entering Username field and Password field by leaving Password confirmation field empty

labels.name: testClass
labels.value: Verify that the tooltip message is displayed when user clicks on Register button after entering Username field and Password field by leaving Password confirmation field empty

name: Verify that the tooltip message is displayed when user clicks on Register button after entering Username field and Password field by leaving Password confirmation field empty

steps.name: Given  User launches the browser and enters the DsAlgo application url
When  the user clicks on Get Started button in the DsAlgo Portal
And  user clicks on Register link in the Home page
Then  the page title should be displayed as "Registration"
When  the user enters only "Sgs@gmail" and "Stars123" fields in the register form
And  user clicks on Register button
Then  the user should get tooltip message as "Please fill out this field." below Password confirmation textbox
